title: Daryl Leigh Miller Memorial Scholarship Fund
description: To provide scholarship awards for eligible students enrolled in the College of Education's Leadership or Counseling and Human Services departments. If $25,000 is raised within five years, the fund will be administered as a permanent endowment.
marketingContent: To provide scholarship awards for eligible students enrolled in the College of Education's Leadership or Counseling and Human Services departments. If $25,000 is raised within five years, the fund will be administered as a permanent endowment.
